name: .SHR File Extension
summary: Learn about .SHR files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Self-extracting archive created with the Unix shar program; contains a shell script with instructions on how to extract the contents; used on Unix systems with the Bourne shell installed.

content: Shar archives also use the .SH and .SHAR extensions.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
